content: dylan the dino 1 is a cute and very soft dinosaur who is ready to become someone s new snuggle buddy he is crocheted in baby snuggle solid which is available in some wonderful colors pick the colors you like best and don t delay getting started on dylan the dino enjoy **skill level ** intermediate **crochet hook ** 5 mm and 3 5 mm **approx size ** 33 x 23 cm **materials ** pins stuffing sewing thread needle safety eyes 18 mm stitch marker a little bit of black cotton 8/4 **yarn ** baby snuggle solid light blue #05 or pastel purple #04 - 2 skeins soft pink #03 - 1 skein **yarn ** rainbow cotton 8/8 pink #045 - 1 skein **abbreviations ** **chain** - chain stitch **single_crochet** - single_crochet **1 increase** - work 2 sts in same st **1 decrease** - work 2 sts together **slip_stitch** - slip_stitch 1 https //hobbii com/dylan-the-dino utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=dylan-the-dino+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
